s|sevzi+cusku:  self-express:   x1 = cusku1 (speaker), x2 = cusku2 (said), x3 = cusku3 (addressed), x4 = cusku4 (expression medium )
s|cnici+gasnu:  to order, to sort:   x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = cnici1 (orderly), x3 = cnici2 (orderliness property)
s|sevzi+xruti:  to return (intr.):   x1 = xruti1 (return) = xruti2 (returned), x2 = xruti3 (state returned to), x3 = xruti4 (state returned from)
s|stedu+bongu:  skull:   x1 = bongu1 (bone), x2 = stedu2 (has head)
s|nicte+djacu:  dew:   x1 = djacu1 (water) (other places possible, but they would involve tanru with carvi)
s|bartu+flecu:  to flow out of:   x1 = flecu1 (flow), x2 = flecu2 (has flow), x3 = flecu4 (flow source ) = bartu2 (has outside) (omit, x4 = flecu3 (flow destination )  = bartu1 (something external))
s|stedu+te+jorne:  head joint:   x1 = jorne3 (joint) = stedu1 (head), x2 = jorne2 (joined to), x3 = jorne1 (joined)
s|skami+saske:  computer science:   x1 = saske1 (science), x2 = saske3 (science methodology)
s|se+bandu+djica:  want to be defended by:   x1 = djica1 (desire) = bandu2 (protected), x2 = bandu1 (defender), x3 = bandu3 (adversary), x4 = djica3 (purpose desired for)
s|se+canlu:  to occupy a space; takes up space:   x1 = canlu2 (takes up space), x2 = canlu1 (space)
COI*     no thanks to you                          vocative: thanks - no thanks to you
s|se+cmima+sumji:  set union:   x1 = sumji1 (sum) = cmima2 (set of member), x2 = sumji2 (1st summand)  = cmima2 (set of member), x3 = sumji3 (2nd summand)  = cmima2 (set of member)
s|se+danti+sazri:  shooting:   x1 = sazri1 (operate), x2 = sazri2 (operated) = danti2 (gun), x3 = sazri3 (operating goal)
s|cpacu+tugni:  accept [something]:   x1 = tugni1 (agree) = cpacu1 (get), x2 = tugni2 (agreed with)  = cpacu3 (got from), x3 = cpacu2 (gotten)  = tugni4 (agreed about)
s|se+cfipu+sanli:  to gawk:   x1 = cfipu2 (confused) = sanli1 (stand), x2 = sanli2 (surface stood on), x3 = cfipu1 (confusing), x4 = cfipu3 (confusing property)
